'''The Cornerstone of Stars and Flames''' is a [[Character Level-Up Material]]. It is used exclusively with [[Traveler (Pyro)]] to level up their [[talent]]s in place of [[Weekly Boss Drops]].

==How to Obtain==
As of [[Version 5.5]], a total of '''12''' The Cornerstone of Stars and Flames can be obtained: 
* [[Archon Quest]]s
** {{Quest|Past and Future|showType=0}}
** {{Quest|A Fuel Named "Fate"|showType=0}}
** {{Quest|When All Becomes a Monument|showType=0}}
* [[Tribal Chronicle]]s
** {{Quest|The Mysterious Island's Truth|showType=0}}
** {{Quest|The Last Turnfire Night|showType=0}}
** {{Quest|Wailing Cacophony|showType=0}}
** {{Quest|Time for the Showdown|showType=0}}
** {{Quest|The Color of Memory|showType=0}}
** {{Quest|Smokeless War|showType=0}}
* [[World Quest]]s
** {{Quest|Revelations from the Past|showType=0}}
** {{Quest|The Chosen One's Promise (Quest)|showType=0}}
** {{Quest|An Omen of Annihilation and the Final Entreaty|showType=0}}
